@judge732:
Follow this instruction to run the game.
1. Copy the folder Final Fantasy VII Hard Type Disk 1 to your memory stick.

2. Be sure to put the folder on m0:\PSP\GAME directory.

3. Now, rename the folder to FFVIID1 and this will solve your problem regarding corrupted data.

4. Do the same on folder Disk 2 and Disk 3 but be sure that you don't have the same folder name on your memory stick.

Good luck and have a nice gaming day...peace.
